se":"GPL-3.0","urls":["bzz-raw://d3ccddf8be942d24fbf46267177ceecbe428bee0e2651903669cdd674b7b7481","dweb:/ipfs/QmfQYE5GB7gkCru6nmac1awMFeAYYrBL7UJGFQhfFGA1DJ"]}},"version":1}

documentation.text: @dev Check if the current caller is the contract owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct Bookstore.Book memory[] memory)

documentation.text:
@dev Add a Book with predefined `name`, `description` and `price`
 to the bookstore.
 Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
 Emits a {NewBook} event.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

documentation.text:
@dev Borrow a book has `_bookId`. The rental period starts from
 `startTime` ends with `endTime`.
 Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
 Emits a `NewPurchase` event.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You are not authorised to delete this book."

arguments.value: You are not authorised to delete this book.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You are not authorised to delete this book."

documentation.text:
@dev Delete a book from the bookstore. Only the book's owner or the
 bookstore's owner is authorised for this operation.
 Returns a boolean value indicating whether the operation succeeded.
 Emits a `DeleteBook` event.
@dev Calculate the number of days a book is rented out.
@dev Send TRX to the book's owner.

@dev Emitted when a new book is added to the bookstore.
 Note `bookId` starts from 0.

@dev Emitted when a new book rental is made.
 Note `transactionId` and `bookId` start from 0.
@dev Emitted when a book is deleted from the bookstore.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
